name: burger
description: > This is a Node/Express application using MySQL as the database and Handlebars to server the HTML page ## Table of Contents * [Installation](#installation) * [Usage](#usage) * [License](#license) * [Contributing](#contributing) * [Tests](#tests) * [Questions](#questions) ## Installation #### Please follow this command to install npm dependencies: > npm i #### Please use this link to go to the application: > ENTER LINK HERE FROM HEROKU ## Usage > This application is just a fun way to eat all kinds of burgers minus the calories. ## Credits > I worked on this application on my own and used a lot of google-fu/videos from class to complete. ## License > None ## Tests > Postman Application to test routes and data retrieval ## Questions > Please send any inquiries or concerns through [acerjak](https://api.github.com/users/acerjak "GitHub Profile") or at amandacerjak@gmail.com.
